pageDescription: Customize the application to your preferences
dataManagementDescription: Export, import, or delete your application data. Please perform these actions with caution.

currencyWarning.title: Important Note on Currency Change
currencyWarning.description: Changing the default currency only affects the display of summarized amounts (like in the dashboard). It does not convert existing transactions. At this stage, for accurate calculations, it is recommended to enter all transactions in the same currency.

financial.autoCalcChomeshDescription: Automatically add Chomesh to all income.
financial.minMaaserPercentageDescription: Set minimum percentage for donation from all income

notifications.emailNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications and summaries via email
notifications.autostartDescription: Recommended to get timely reminders, even if the app is closed.

importExport.exportDescription: Export all application data to a file
importExport.importDescription: Import data from a backup file

clearData.title: Clear Data
clearData.warningDescription: This action will permanently delete all your data and cannot be undone.
